exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : 2 <= p n : nat Hn0 : n <> 0 The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "?n <> 0".

In environment H : forall n : nat, (n = 0 -> False) -> {l : list nat | n = fold_right Init.Nat.mul 1 l /\\ Forall prime l} p : nat Hp : 2 <= p n : nat Hn0 : n = 0 -> False Unable to unify "False" with "{l : list nat | n = expand p l}".
The reference l was not found in the current environment.
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.

original: elim (eq_nat_dec n 0). - intros H. exists nil. simpl. rewrite H. auto. - intros Hn0. destruct (prime_decomp n) as [l [H1 H2]]. ++ intro. apply Hn0. auto. ++ exists l. rewrite H1. apply f_equal.
